summary:
**Summary:**

"Charmed" is an American TV show about three sisters, known as the Charmed Ones, who are powerful witches. They use their magic, called the "Power of Three," to protect people from evil creatures. The series follows their lives in San Francisco as they try to keep their supernatural identities secret.

The show was popular on The WB network, running for eight seasons from 1998 to 2006. It won awards and influenced other TV shows. A reboot with new characters started in 2018.
title: Charmed
